Text: Im a wannabe-geek so I am going to download this :)
Anychance someone can reseed this one?

First of all, why .rar a file with one file and a compression ratio of 1%? It merely adds an unnecessary step to the download process.

Second, the .avi file would not play in VLC Media Player until I took out the trash in the file name and reduced it to TRON.AVI. Worked fine after that.
